DataElement.preferredName: Prior Harvest Procedure Tissue Donor Other Treat Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe other treatment that the donor received prior to the harvest procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Harvest Procedure Tissue Donor Other Treat
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Remove from a culture or a living or dead body, as for the purposes of transplantation._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Harvest; remove from a culture or a living or dead body, as for the purposes of transplantation.:Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Remove from a culture or a living or dead body, as for the purposes of transplantation.
Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Subject to a process with the aim of readying for some purpose, improving, or remedying a condition.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify other treatment that
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify other treatment that the donor received to enhance the product collection:

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2773880
ReferenceDocuments.description: "PerformedProcedure > DefinedProcedure.nameCode(CD).originalText [1, some pre-collection therapy] WHERE  PerformedProcedure > DefinedProcedure [1] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [2] > DefinedProcedure [3] > DefinedCompositionRelationship [4] > DefinedProcedure [5] AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode(CD).nullFlavor = ""OTH"" AND DefinedProcedure.reasonCode [1] = ""enhance product collection""  AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode [3] = ""perform harvest composite activity"" AND DefinedProcedure.nameCode [5] = ""extract stem cell harvest"" AND DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [2] IS LESS THAN DefinedCompositionRelationship.sequenceNumber [4]"

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-8-20 ak System generated def displayed as alt def.  Added aqt "Specify other treatment" for 2100r2 SW 3/4/10. 11/15/10mn-added aqt 'specify'.
